title: Ep - 44 - Southern Charm's Austen Kroll
description:
Austen Kroll from Southern Charm explains how he was cast for the show and how the show has impacted his life since it began airing. Ashley Borders from Southern Charm Savannah gives background on her career and life before the show, why she spent half the show in a bathing suit, and whether she resents anyone else having a career in fashion in Savannah. Podcast host Rob Cesternino discusses with Kate the premiere episode of Big Brother and she forces him to watch an episode of Real Housewives of New York. 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
